articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Netflix's Best New Movie Arrives With A Near-Perfect 98% On Rotten Tomatoes - Forbes
articles.description: The best new movie to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with near-perfect scores from critics, and it marks the return of a brilliant director.
articles.content:
Hit Man
Netflix
When I first saw the poster for Netflixs Hit Man, it looked like something you might find on Amazon Prime Videos digital store after scrolling over eight times past a bunch of other… [+2274 chars]
